queries.find_place: select id, name, X(the_geom) as lon, Y(the_geom) as lat, Z(the_geom) as alt FROM forecast_places WHERE name LIKE :name
queries.forecasts: select p.id, p.name, X(p.the_geom) as lon, Y(p.the_geom) as lat, Z(p.the_geom) as alt, f.timestep, f.name as variable, f.value FROM forecast_places AS p JOIN forecasts as f ON p.id = f.place_id WHERE id = :id
queries.forecast: select p.id, p.name, X(p.the_geom) as lon, Y(p.the_geom) as lat, Z(p.the_geom) as alt, f.timestep, f.name as variable, f.value FROM forecast_places AS p JOIN forecasts as f ON p.id = f.place_id WHERE p.id = :id AND f.name = :variable
